item.title: AI Engineer internship
item.description: VanillaHR Internship Experience Project Overview Duration: 05/13/2024 - 09/30/2024 During my internship at VanillaHR, I was tasked with designing and deploying an innovative CV parsing solution. This project aimed to enhance the recruitment process by employing AI for efficient extraction and analysis of candidate information. Responsibilities and Contribution Developed an AI-based CV parsing model to extract relevant information from resumes, ensuring high accuracy and reliability. Optimized deployment processes on AWS, leveraging cloud services to create a scalable and robust solution.
